sourcesContent:
import './AboutPage.scss'; function AboutPage() { return (

About

I'm a full-stack web developer based in Kamloops, BC, Canada.

The world of tech entered my life as a kid when my dad started building computers from scratch as a hobby. From the age of 10 onwards, every time my dad built a newer, more powerful, computer, he gifted me the previous one.

My first recollection of hacking any software was to earn more money in order to build bigger, better houses in the video game Sims (#motherlode), then I went on to creating fun visuals instead, on a simplified version of Photoshop, and the rest is history. Computers were fun. I was hooked!

In 2015, I graduated with a Bachelor's degree in Communication and Media. This is where I truly discovered the power of coding, studying the basics of HTML, CSS and JavaScript, and realizing that loving both creativity and logic was not contradictory.

After half a decade working in marketing and keeping coding on the recreational side, I decided to pursue a formal education in web development at BrainStation where I graduated with a Diploma in Web Development.

I am now looking for my next adventure in the tech industry. If my story resonates with you, feel free to say hello!

Skillset

  • HTML5
  • CSS
  • Sass
  • JavaScript (ES6)
  • React.js
  • Node.js
  • Express.js
  • REST APIs
  • User Authentication
  • OAuth
  • Git Version Control
  • GitHub
  • WebPack
  • MySQL
  • Jest
  • Enzyme
  • Adobe Photoshop
  • Adobe Illustrator
  • Adobe InDesign
); } export default AboutPage;
